Title: Bingo
Writer: Vince Gilligan (created by), Peter Gould (created by), Gennifer Hutchison, Gordon Smith (staff writer)
Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn, Patrick Fabian
Plot: The Kettlemans seek Jimmy as their lawyer after turning down an offer from HHM, going as far as attempting to blackmail him.
